# ispconfig_mysql_database_user (Resource)

Manages a MySQL database user in ISP Config.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ispconfig_mysql_database_user" "example" {
  database_user     = "myapp_user"
  database_password = var.db_password
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `database_user` (String) The MySQL database username.
- `database_password` (String, Sensitive) The MySQL database password.

### Optional

- `client_id` (Number) The ISP Config client ID.
- `server_id` (Number) The server ID.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of the database user.

## Import

Import an existing MySQL database user by its numeric ISP Config ID:

```shell
terraform import ispconfig_mysql_database_user.example 42
```
